short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best Tasks Online Default Search allows you to configure your default search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Best Tasks Online Default Search is a powerful extension for Chrome browser that gives you the ability to conveniently manage your daily tasks and explore search results powered by Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Best Tasks Online" Chrome extension and hereby agree to change default search to Best Tasks Online Search provided by the service, and I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

How to use:
Type preferred search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Best Tasks Online Search will provide exceptional custom search results powered by Bing.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.
Visit our website at https://besttasksonline.com/
Read About us: https://besttasksonline.com/about-search/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://besttasksonline.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://besttasksonline.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://besttasksonline.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/

If at any point after installing you feel that Your Best Streams Default Search is not right for you, don't worry about it! There are two simple ways to uninstall the extension.

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click 'Remove'

Or

Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on 'Extensions'
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the 'Remove' button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
